channel.title: How to download a server
channel.description:
[ul]How to Run And Host A Server.(Includes Portfowarding)
Hello! Today I will Be Teaching You How To Host A Rsps Server 317+
(Information: Im a little rusty ive been hanging out with my girlfriend and friends ALOT, so tell me if i make mistakes.)
First Things First, Open Up Cmd By
Start>> Run>> Cmd OR start>>search>>cmd
Type In: Code:
IPCONFIG
Tutorial:
Now Find The Ones That Say
Ipv4 Adress: ???.???.?.? SubnetMask: : 255.255.255.0 Default GateWay: (Example: 192.168.2.1)
Tutorial:
Write These Down!
Open Up Internet Explorer Or Google Chrome Or Any Other Internet Browser! I Suggest Google Chrome.
Remember How I told you to write down your default Gateway. Get that And type It In and go to it.
Tutorial:
Go to www.google.com And type In "Portfoward.com"
Open Up The Site.
* Pick your Router Model * Skip The Advert On The Right Hand Corner * Press Ctrl + F And Type In "Runescape" * click On It
[/ul]
Tutorial:
Open Up Your Default GateWay Again!: 192.168.2.1 (Example)
Follow The Intstructions From www.portfoward.com
Tutorial For Portfowarding For ZYXEFL:
How to get a no-ip Server!
Go Here http://www.no-ip.com/ Sign Up For An Account.
After You Sign Up Go Here: https://www.no-ip.com/members/ Click On "Add Host"
Put A Hostname, Example: l NOOBSCAPE24.zapto.org I prefer: no-ip.org, no-ip.biz, no-ip.com, and zapto.org.
Scroll down And press Create Host!
Tutorial:
Download It. Install It. Open It Up. Click On The CheckBox On Your Host!
Tutorial: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OtLwRsEq0t4
Download A Source And client:
I would Suggest To Look In Here.
How to Run Your Server!!!
* Download A Source And Client * Open Up The Source * Open Up No-ip DUC (Make sure The Checkbox Is ON!!!) * go to Your Client! * Open The Folder * Find Gui.java * Open it * Press CTRL +F And type "Ip" * You Will See An Ip that Says, 0.0.0.0, Or 192.168.2.1 Or Something Like that * Change It To Your Ip On Your No-Ip * Open Up The client * Have Fun!!!
I will Add The Video Tutorial Tomorrow For The Chapter Above! Talking To Mah Babe Rachel
All Credits To Noob Koer, Youtube Channel : Multicomptutorials
Youtube Channel:
Any Spelling Incorrect Please Tell Me!
Sorry I made this tutorial in like 2 hours. Good Luck!

item.title: How to download a server
item.dc:creator: @m0tive_kill m0tive kill
item.description:
@m0tive_kill wrote:

[ul]How to Run And Host A Server.(Includes Portfowarding)

Hello! Today I will Be Teaching You How To Host A Rsps Server 317+

(Information: Im a little rusty ive been hanging out with my girlfriend and friends ALOT, so tell me if i make mistakes.)

First Things First,
Open Up Cmd By

Start>> Run>> Cmd
OR
start>>search>>cmd

Type In:
Code:

IPCONFIG

Tutorial:




Now Find The Ones That Say

Ipv4 Adress: ???.???.?.?
SubnetMask: : 255.255.255.0
Default GateWay: (Example: 192.168.2.1)

Tutorial:


Write These Down!

Open Up Internet Explorer Or Google Chrome Or Any Other Internet Browser!
I Suggest Google Chrome.

Remember How I told you to write down your default Gateway. Get that And type It In and go to it.

Tutorial:


Go to www.google.com
And type In "Portfoward.com"

Open Up The Site.

    * Pick your Router Model
    * Skip The Advert On The Right Hand Corner
    * Press Ctrl + F And Type In "Runescape"
    * click On It

[/ul]

Tutorial:




Open Up Your Default GateWay Again!: 192.168.2.1 (Example)

Follow The Intstructions From www.portfoward.com

Tutorial For Portfowarding For ZYXEFL:




How to get a no-ip Server!

Go Here http://www.no-ip.com/
Sign Up For An Account.

After You Sign Up Go Here: https://www.no-ip.com/members/
Click On "Add Host"

Put A Hostname, Example: l NOOBSCAPE24.zapto.org
I prefer: no-ip.org, no-ip.biz, no-ip.com, and zapto.org.

Scroll down And press Create Host!

Tutorial:

Download It.
Install It.
Open It Up.
Click On The CheckBox On Your Host!

Tutorial: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OtLwRsEq0t4


Download A Source And client:

I would Suggest To Look In Here.

How to Run Your Server!!!

    * Download A Source And Client
    * Open Up The Source
    * Open Up No-ip DUC (Make sure The Checkbox Is ON!!!)
    * go to Your Client!
    * Open The Folder
    * Find Gui.java
    * Open it
    * Press CTRL +F And type "Ip"
    * You Will See An Ip that Says, 0.0.0.0, Or 192.168.2.1 Or Something Like that
    * Change It To Your Ip On Your No-Ip
    * Open Up The client
    * Have Fun!!!


I will Add The Video Tutorial Tomorrow For The Chapter Above! Talking To Mah Babe Rachel


All Credits To Noob Koer, Youtube Channel : Multicomptutorials

Youtube Channel:

Any Spelling Incorrect Please Tell Me!

Sorry I made this tutorial in like 2 hours.
Good Luck!

Read full topic
